pageContext.claim: “I never offered Pardons to Homeland Security Officials, never ordered anyone to close our Southern Border (although I have the absolute right to do so, and may if Mexico does not apprehend the illegals coming to our Border), and am not 'frustrated.' It is all Fake & Corrupt News!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is denying reports that he offered a pardon to the incoming Homeland Security Secretary if he was deemed to have violated the law in acting on Trump's order to close the southern border. There is little dispute that Trump said something along these lines. The question is whether he meant it as a joke -- or if it was received as one.
